TopicTitle: Shorter Mk II - Mk I adaptor, and shorter Mk II bi coupler.

Articles.Content: Pretty simple, I have at times wished for a Mk II - I adaptor that is much shorter than currently available, the one we have is a full fuselage, but sometime I just want something like the flat adaptors for rockets. Along with that a bi coupler version would also be great. In both instances one may not need or want the weight and length of the current parts, but it looks terrible to attach smaller parts to the ends of MK II parts directly.

Oh man.

These ideas are great. We all want our crafts to look nice and be functional... Right?
